summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CipherShare secure secret sharing app. All core functionality working correctly including end-to-end encryption, PIN protection, one-time view, QR code generation, and theme toggle.

fixed_issues.issue: PinVerify model required pin_hash field even for secrets without PIN protection
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Made pin_hash field optional in PinVerify model

passed_tests: Backend API: All 16 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Home page loads with create secret form
Secret text entry in textarea works
Expiry time dropdown selection works (tested 6 hours)
PIN protection toggle and PIN input works
Create Secure Link button creates secret and navigates to share page
Share page displays link and QR code correctly
View secret page loads when accessing share link
PIN entry works on view page when required
Secret decryption and display works correctly
One-time view secret deletion after viewing works
QR code generation and display works
